definitions.text: a wrong action attributable to bad judgment or ignorance or inattention
examples: she was quick to point out my errors
I could understand his English in spite of his grammatical faults

definitions.text: a misconception resulting from incorrect information
(baseball) a failure of a defensive player to make an out when normal play would have sufficed
departure from what is ethically acceptable
(computer science) the occurrence of an incorrect result produced by a computer
part of a statement that is not correct
examples: the book was full of errors
